message.body: http://houseinfinite.tumblr.com/post/25910847381/500-words
specifically the second paragraph, haven't gotten through the whole post yet

Realizing that desire was at best an unreliable motivator and, moreover, one I had already worked around, I turned my sheer, defiant bloody mindedness into an asset. In a single phrase: why did I do these things? Because fuck you, thatâ€™s why. (And by you, I mean me. But also you, because fuck you too.)
Yep
did you write that?
Nope
But I know the guy who did
doesn't surprise me
I agree with a few things he said
but overall, I think he's got it wrong
oh?
he's still _thinking_ too much
He's a philosophy major
Or was
Is not currently in school
it started strong, but then went a little sour
ended up a bit like, "so I write, not because I have the _desire_ to write, but because, 'Fuck You!'"
I think it diverged from that
The bridge to me seemed to be "it was easy because I didn't see it as a choice to be made, but just something to do"
"So now I'm trying to apply that mindset to other things in my life, and by making my desires visible and present, I see them less as a choice and more as a definitive step that must be taken"
Or something
mm
but he's basically stating that he does indeed desire them
and in that 'bridge' statement, he is correct
you could get into the whole 'free will' debate again, but it just doesn't matter
at that point you're just running in circles
Right now, I _desire_ my glasses
but really, I just desire the sight that they provide
Actually, looking at the post now, the list of goals is relatively detached from the initial premise of desire

Obviously they are related, semantically speaking. But that's not what he's addressing. He was saying [part 1: leveraging stubbornness in a particular way is one of the keys to his success] and [part 2: another key was measurement] and then he listed the things he's measuring
So, he didn't bring it back around to completely probe how his relationship with desire affects/interacts with that list of things he wants to do
But that wasn't really the point
can't tell how I should read your FB comment
then I feel I have succeeded
Anyone ever tell you you're really annoying sometimes? >.>
just once
but it doesn't matter
So I kind of want to murder my roommate
and I've got myself in a bit of a situation
Oh fun.
Something new and different. ^_^
yup
You know how annoying it can be living with someone that is a complete flake, lazy, and a horrible communicator, yet everyone thinks he's this great guy?
sure
well then you understand completely what I have to deal with
he gets these couchsurfers to stay with him, but then he just bails on them and I end up picking up the slack
but he retains his stellar cs presence
So tell him to scale back the CSers unless he knows he can deal with them
ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh
here we go
Are you upset that he's beating you on CSing or something? lol
well, apparently he has like three more staying this weekend, none of which I approved
no, I'm not concerned about that
I'm ten times the host he is, regardless of what statistics show
lol
and it's stilll MY FUCKING HOUSE!
AND my couch
what pisses me off is that he gets away with it. No one is going to leave him a negative reference. So he gets the self-satisfaction out of it, but doesn't have to do a damn thing
The last cser that stayed with us he told to take the bus here from the train station
He was off that day
sat around the house and did nothing
So?
Did he agree to pick the person up?
So fucking pick her up from the goddamned train station, it's ten minutes away
then, after she got off at the wrong stop (probably his miscommunication) he went and picked her up from the mall anyway
they walk in, and she's carrying a giant backpack
I'm like, "seriously?"
"are you trying to look like a complete douche?"
maybe she doesn't like people handling her stuff
I would've carried my own bag too
please
that's not the point
Oh, right, ranting, sorry
and yes, there's a possibility he offered, but not likely
and then the comments
about her, "not being that hot"
So kick him out
and when he asked me if I wanted to :"ride along" when we left to pick her up and I said I was busy
It's not like he's contributing all that much
he says, "if she was hot, you would go"
and I respond, "no, that's not why I am not going, it's because I have shit to do..."
anyway
so I managed to snag another date with christine
problem is, I was planning on going to social wednesday, where claire will be
Who, coincidentally, slept over last night
Is that my notice?
Or?
nope
k
as in she stopped you or it just didn't seem like the time?
in this case, she basically stopped me
k
said, I want to, but...
good for her
I was like, "okay..."
O.o
she said we should slow it down a bit
and proceeded to do a very bad job of that
lol
which, eh
but I am impressed by her will-power
Why?
because it was really, really close
Even while you're in the middle of things
Some guys would call that being a tease.
mmm, yeah I can see that but it wasnt a big deal
If she keeps doing it, you might change your mind, haha
oh, yeah
I will just lose interest eventually
oh, and I told her I have another date tonight
That's good
Does she know about our thing?
which makes me showing up at happy hour all the more odd
It's kind of conspicuous =/
NOOO
and I do feel a little bad about that, but we aren't dating
like I said, she didn't ask if I was sleeping with anyone
Yeah, that's a tough situation
I'm starting to think 2012 is a magical year
thanks =|
what?
yeah, it seems to be one of the more interesting years I've had so far
I'm kind of ok with not going to social wednesday
I already told Claire the situation
and it would probably be a little uncomfortable for her if I did
although she does have my glasses >.<
...how?
left them in her car
ah
oh kristin is home
HAHA!
Min wrote me a reference on cs, and said I'm a great guitarist
how clueless
What an ass =P
very kind of her'
but not factual
You don't have to be a world-class guitarist for people to appreciate what you do
right, and clearly she did
she asked me if I played, so I gave her a little concert and showed her my guitars
So, subjectively, if she found you to be great, you are
right
I just don't want to set high expectations
You could just get better ;)
I could
maybe I should write it down
_play guitar for 2 hours everyday_
But then you might actually be compelled to do it
yeah, because writing it down will make it happen.
It's not like it's fucking magic
well, I'd better go. Looks like Christine and I are meeting elsewhere for drinks
It's just a technique to prioritize, remind, and motivate
Just because you're all "ooooh, nothing matters, lists are for losers" doesn't mean your way is the only way to get by
no, of course not
"no, of course not... it's just the best way"
by all means, if making lists or whatever works for you, then knock yourself out
I managed to go to both social wednesday and my date with Christine. The universe did not collapse upon itself
grats
I dig this girl
which, I dunno...
Dude, you've gone out with her 2ce?
Chill the fuck out
You don't need to define anything right now
yes. 2ce
and I am not
it's not that
its the other stuff
I felt a little weird leaving sw the way I did, with claire there and all
SW?
social wed
but...
I did get my glasses back
ah
ok
can I be honest?
haha
yep
srsly
What?
I find this girl more attractive, yes
Than? Claire?
Me?
Amy?
All of the above?
eh
I was referring only to claire
don't make this more complex than it already is
Nothing has to be more complex than you let it be
You _like_ this stuff remember
hmm
to some extent
I don't like it so much when it involves other people
uh
when does your drama ever NOT involve other people?
hmmm
I don't like to think of it as drama
You make it drama
I?
how so?
You make things this huge deal
Like you don't have any control over what's going on
Except you are the one in control
And you keep opting to make these decisions
And then you panic yourself over them
I just can't wrap my head around why you spend so much emotional energy on trying to figure out what to do.
Either you're okay with dating both of them at once, or your not
you're*
If you're not, then you need to talk to Claire and tell her that you would feel it was being unfair to her
If you are comfortable with it, then why are you even spending time thinking about it at this point?
Just make sure that they both know what you're looking for
And if they're not okay with that, they can leave
None of this is hard
done
Are you inquiring if I am done?
no, I am saying that I've done all that
I'm fine with it
Then why worry about it
but I am concerned for the feeling/expectations of others
Dude
Why
dunno
If you're SURE that you've made your intentions clear
I don't want to hurt people?
doesn't matter
Then it's THEIR responsibility to not get themselves hurt
but still, I have an affect
It's not like you're tricking them
possibly
So?
so I feel bad, if the result is emotional pain
Why?
They inflicted it on themselves at that point
because I am human?
I didn't realize that TAKING EVERY REASONABLE PRECAUTION to avoid hurting someone still wasn't enough
You have to do even more?
I suppose not
You are so strange sometimes
Or strange to me
For all I know you're normal and I'm the weird one
But basically, as long as you told someone the stove is on, you've done what you could to prevent them from burning themselves
eh
no, I'm weird
Oh
I know
You could turn OFF the stove
Just stop dating anyone
hmm
Then you'll never risk hurting anyone
but it's still hot
Problem solved.
hehe
for a while
That or stop dating children who are apparently not capable of making informed decisions for themselves
I'm not saying that they are not
I just generally prefer to not be the cause of any emotional pain
and even if I am upfront and honest about my feelings/intentions, things happen
and I don't necessarily think that it's entirely their fault, nor do I believe that I am responsible
it's just circumstances
They're taking a calculated risk
You can't prevent them from miscalculating
I think you are missing the point
No, I think you're just overly invested in trying not to hurt people
Or overly concerned with hurting people
If it happens, it happens
It's not like it's going to be a massive heartbreak
yeah, I think I am just more compassionate than you
and that is fine
you seem to not give a fuck, generally
and I get that
I do give a fuck
I go out of my way to manage my platonic relationships with men to ensure they do not develop crushes on me
because I often don't give a fuck
I also make damn sure that the men I'm involved with know where I stand
oh?
Did I not pester you repeatedly to make sure you weren't developing feelings for me?
I made absolutely sure that Michael knew about you
unnecessarily
No, it wasn't unnecessary
I didn't consider it unnecessary
Because I rather liked him and was hoping to develop some sort of dating relationship with him
ok
so therefore you found it necessary to tell him that you're fucking some other dude, but aren't dating him
what do you think his reaction to that sort of statement would be?
I didn't really care
At the point that I told him
If he wasn't okay with it, he could leave
No big deal
Which might be exactly what he did
And him leaving was no big deal
but you don't see it as unnecessary?
No
_if_ things had gone differently, and a relationship of sorts developed, you could have told me to "fuck off" as it were, and that would have been it
Yeah, but I wasn't willing to do that at that point
Or in the foreseeable future
I mean, that is pretty much my mentality, except for Amy, which is of course an entirely different story
yeah, I know. That's what I meant
Nah, but he asked who you were and what you were to me
"fuck off" is just easier to type
I'm not going to lie or put it off
so you said, "a penis"
If I were looking for a serious relationship, I probably wouldn't say anything
But I'm not looking for a serious relationship
why not just be?
instead of "not"
let the rest sort itself out
Because.
I'm _not_ not looking for a serious relationship
I'm just dating open-mindedly
if that is a word
Amusingly enough, I've been talking to two guys I'd probably be fine with having a serious relationship with
Fortunately neither of them live in the state
ok
maybe you are weird
what's wrong with a serious relationship?
or the idea of it, anyway?
There's nothing wrong with it
It just indicates a change in my lifestyle
Or would precipitate one
you're going to have a change in your lifestyle eventually
And I'm semi-reluctant to go with that
Yeah?
What's your point.
besides, how much is it going to change?
I never said that if a relationship comes along that I'd avoid it like the plague
that is almost what you are saying
Just that I'm putting more barriers in front of one that one might normally do
I'm kind of hungry
I'm hungry
I should eat something
And exhausted =(
fucking work
eh, got my second wind
Am I coming down tomorrow night?
I was just about to ask you the same thing
are you?
Right now I don't even want to think about moving to my bed, let alone driving anywhere
hmm
brb
mmk
mmm
sleep deprivation doesn't really work on me
so
yeah
I dunno
I guess if you want to come out
part of me feels like I've had too much this week
k
the other part of me welcomes the interaction
like, why not cram in as much as possible? who needs a break? not I
Fuck this keyboard, and my fingers >.<
I'll just pack a bag and we can figure it out tomorrow
good plan
Everything is starting to seem surreal =/
everything...is surreal
Dude
Don't do that to me right now
I barely have enough brainpower to read
Let alone engage in abstract thinking
or do you?
wtf spotify
I do not have time for your operational hiccups
Christine told me that her mother passed a few years ago
I never know how to react to that sort of news
"Oh, that's awful"
yeah, pretty much what I said
she told me that shelost her mother. split with her fiancee, and moved back home after school in a short amount of time
Busy year
yeah, in like a couple months
that didn't flow as snarkily
or wasn't as quippy
Let's go with that
Snark implies at least some level of sarcasm or malice
Whereas I was just being insensitive
it's weird how quickly you can change gears
I've all but forgotten about amy
and at this point, claire
I mean, they are still there, obviously
but it's just interesting how quickly you can adapt to a different person
yep
as if it takes no time at all
Kind of mindblowing that I just met the one guy yesterday
Literally
And we've talked about almost every private aspect of our lives already
yeah
it's unfortunate
Nah
Vibrancy
Claire and I don't seem to connect on some level
one thing I like about concurrent dates is it allows me to clearly compare them
and I have to say, I connected better, conversationally anyway, with Christine tonight
Not to seem all comparey or anything
More gushy, if anything
But conversation with Adam is basically exhilarating
It's like a fast-paced clusterfuck of literary allusions, double entendres, and actual content
yeah, I don't know if I even want exhilarating
It's fucking hot, man.
can't maintain that shit though
Yeah
That's alright
I'm exhausted anyway right now lol
everything gets old
Claire would get old
Christine would get old
Amy would...well, that's different
Aren't you Mr. Sunshine and Light
Oh for fuck's sake
um hmm
she's well, already old
as in a different case entirely, but yes, also would get old
You know what's getting old?
This proposal.
it is rather sad
but it's true
once you get over the exhilaration, what do you have left?
I guess that is really what I am looking for, someone where I feel there is something left after the dust settles
He's hot and we have tons in common
So...there's that
ok
"he's hot"
On my side of things
who cares
I never get tired of biceps ^_^
uh huh
because it's so fucking important
You think I'm joking? lol
I didn't say it's important
so
I said it's diversionary
then why?
Why what?
He and I literally have tons in common
it's like tits on a girl. I don't give a fuck
That's just, like, your opinion, man.
you forgot, "you know..."
I don't want to be interested in a girl because she's hot
neither Claire nor Christine are supermodels by any stretch
and I'm fine with that
/shrug
I wouldn't say that he's going to be getting a call from Calvin Klein any time soon
He's just, definitively, the hottest guy who's definitively expressed interest in dating me
So I'm a little pleased about that
Sue me
I need to stop saying that
What is this, 1998?
eh
weren't you just complaining about how guys aren't interested in you because of your non-feminine physique?
And?
I'm interested in him because of his non-feminine form ^_^
I wasn't really complaining either
Just saying it's unfortunate that my goals/preferences aren't compatible with society at large's
except when it comes to what you look for in men
physically, at least
Hm?
I dunno, seems kind of hypocritical of you
As in I prefer what society prefers when it comes to men?
How is it hypocritical?
I'm not wishing that it was different
I respect everyone's right to be attracted to what they find attractive
I can't change the fact that I don't find flabby, non-muscular guys physically unattractive
damnit
remove a negative there
haha!
and it's saved forever on gchat
Changed directions mid sentence
/shrug
Actions speak louder than words
don't you find it annoying when you realize that you can't be with a particular person solely because of your physical appearance?
No
Hasn't happened
Wait because of mine? Sorry, misread.
uh huh
I've never been told that's the sole case
well, Im not saying that it was ever verbalized
But no, I don't think it would annoy me
but you just _knew_
I'd perhaps feel a little regret for what might have been
I haven't had that experience, tbh
I don't want to miss out on someone spectacular just because they aren't the ideal mate for me physically
Or, at least, I can't recall that right now
If I met someone who I was intellectually and emotionally attracted to, the physical side of things doesn't really matter
But the chances of me meeting someone and getting to know them enough to me intellectually and emotionally attracted to them WITHOUT there being physical attraction seems pretty low these days
There's an older bachelor-ish guy at work who I'd date in a heartbeat given the chance
And he's the antithesis of my physical ideal
Everyone has exceptions, I think.
They just don't apply universally
Then they wouldn't be exceptions
I somewhat doubt I meet anyone's physical "ideal"
Not that big of a deal
ideal may have been a strong word
haha, did I mention that Christine is italian?
Don't hink so
How does that matter exactly?
Holy shit
I'm done
I thought I had 4 more sections to review
grats
to a sane person, it doesn't
ah
I dated an italian before, a looong time ago
it was fucking ridiculous
so I vowed to never do it again
That seems silly
that's because it si
*is
but Christine doesn't fit the stereo type at all
I've never had a desire to date anyone of a particular segment of the population
and yeah, that's one word
Oh, except recently w/ Indian
I'm 1/4 Italian
Do I fit any of the stereotypes?
well, in this case it's to NOT date someone of a particular nationality
or background
part of me still dreams of meeting a girl and just being like, "WOW"
head-spinning, jaw-dropping _WOW_
Yeah
That was pretty much Adam >.>
in the sense that all I want to do is be with this person as much as possible for as long as possible
who is this person?
Random OkC kid
Lives in California
I sent him a random message on Sunday
After I saw that he'd checked out my profile
He happened to be in West Chester for a few days
We had lunch yesterday
Sparks
Was completely unexpected
Neither one of us was expecting anything all that interesting to happen
I was basically looking at it like meeting up with a CSer, tbh
Then it turned into a date
Then he kissed me after walking me back to my car
Ballsy motherfucker
O.o
I love it haha
indeed
so...
He flew out this morning
quit your job, move to CA
Fuck that
it's a lovely state
oh, well, norristown is pretty fantastic too
West Chester is quite adorable though
And he's on contract out in Cali
He grew up around here
Might be moving back
We'll see what happens, but I doubt I'll be moving to the West Coast
dont knock it
it fucking rocks
I was already hoping to visit San Francisco sometime in the "near" future
I'm not knocking it
I just know that I'm northeast
I've already moved around a lot
This is home for me
whatever
If I'm going to move, it's going to be to Europe
I like PA
I love how you 'decide' things
I like my company
I like my college
I like my friends
I'm not fucking moving to CA
all transient things
For you maybe
I'VE DONE ALL OF IT BEFORE
Multiple times
how about just being open to anything? ever consider that?
I like staying put for the time being
How about letting people do what they want? Ever consider minding your own damn business?
you are the most rigid person I've ever met
/shrug
dude, I'm all about people doing what they want
most people don't
they do what other people want them to do, or what they think they want
fucking hysterical
or they're just too fucking scared
You realize how patronizing you are, right?
eh?
Just because I've determined what I want to do, and it's apparently not what you would do/want in my situation, that means that I'm just deceiving myself
I'm making up wants
You don't know what goes on in my head
no, you're being rigid
Yet you sit in judgement on everything, pushing pushing pushing
Acting like I haven't thought things through
Or that my thought processes are flawed
you're not considering other options for any particular reason other than you _decided_ not to
because you've "done that" befre
before
so fucking what
Why? Because I've decided that I'm not going to follow some guy who I just met out to California?
no, that's just how we got on the subject
I don't want to move to the West Coast
because you've already eliminated the option
If something came up that made me challenge that opinion, I would consider it
You really don't know me at all
haha
ok, so quit talking in absolutes then
Northeast Girl
No, fuck you
I'm tired
I'll talk however the fuck I want
don't I
Not lately =P
oh? and what has changed, all the sudden?
Nothing's changed, I was just pointing out that a week has passed
I don't know, maybe things have changed
My goals/priorities have shifted a little
in a week?
I'm not sure how it affects things yet
Yeah
Surprise
eh, I feel like it's been touched up
upon
but what, exactly
and I suppose more interestingly, how?
Not really
No, I've gotten a little less social, I think
I want to focus more on getting my diet & exercise stuff under control and more structured
Going to be trying a couple of new things with both of those
MORE structured?
I want to do more reading and writing
is that even possible?
Differently structured perhaps
Holy fuck
That song just had birds in it at the end
And I started freaking out for a second thinking it was like 5 am or some shit
damnit
haha
you worry about the strangest things
I wonder, sometimes, how you would feel in my shoes
I would never be in your shoes
No offense
yeah, they're too big for you
I can't deal with the loose and chaotic nature of your life
I don't know, I have pretty big feet, they might not be that much bigger
you have no fucking idea
I do have an idea
That's how I know I couldn't deal with it
ok, well it's probably worse than you think
Yeah, well, that's your decision
I decide not to live my life like that
Because it stresses me out and makes me unhappy
but...
Which is why I say I'd never be there
you've never lived this way
How do you know how I've lived in the past?
You've only known me for 2 years
well, have you?
That's 24 unaccounted for
1-18 childhood/adolescence
18-22 college
Which you have no idea about
which you have no idea about
lol
that leaves 2
For all you know, I could have been homeless from 15-17
yup
except I can tell you werent
I'm far too dependent on stability and safety nets to live like you do.
right, because it's comfort to you
it's familiar
I don't deal well with large unknowns
that's what she said
what's the worst thing that could happen?
what are you so afraid of?
The unknown, probably, tbh
I simply do not like not knowing things
It makes me hyperventilate
=P
but you don't know
and you can't
the future is completely unknowable
That's why I must prepare for it!
Bank against it
Safety nets, windfalls, things to fall back on
boring
Not really
I don't think anyone would claim my life is boring at this point
ommfg, what the fuck is wrong with my neck/back?
Is it muscular or skeletal?
former
well, I am embroiled in your crazy-fucking life
Clearly a bit of temporary insanity
it's pretty much always soft tissue
you're welcome
If I end up coming down, perhaps backrub
sometimes I wish I were homeless
then I could truly do whatever I want
I used to be like you
all worried about the future
Really depends on what you want
wanting to have a safety net
I know this isn't perfect
I mean, I hate my job
I love the company, I hate the job
at one point, i had a house, and about $18k saved up
I was like 25 years old
that's impressive
not a lick of debt
aside the mortgage, that is
right
I wasn't happy
I was stable, but unhappy
had a pos girlfriend
who wasn't going to leave
because she was too insecure, and well, I'm fucking awesome
But you don't like schedules
I like schedules
I don't like weird working hours
I had a schedule
At least not constantly fluctuating ones
I had normal working hours
I got dressed up and went to work in a fucking cubicle every day
It was miserable
I didn't do shit
yep
other than try to escape my life
I all but fell in love with a co-worker of mine
because my life was so fucking boring I couldn't stand it anymore
That's why I don't want a serious relationship, btw
All the serious relationships I've had have, ultimately, bored the fuck out of me
Democratically arranging your life, when one person has effective veto power
I don't want that, and I'm not confident in my ability to _not_ do that again
For all that I hate my job and wish I was doing something else, I love my life right now
I do pretty much whatever I want to
No waiting for someone else, no one taking up any more time than I feel like giving them
I don't owe anyone attention
I don't need to consider anyone's schedule
It's glorious
well, perhaps you need to experience a relationship where that is still possible
That'd be nice
But again, I'm not confident that I'd be able to prevent myself from falling back on bad habits
it's funny
yesterday, Claire and I were at the bar, and we were a little tipsy
and she was talking about how she'd like to have a house when she moves back home
I'm down 6 lbs from last week, btw, haha
no beer, no going out
grats, assuming that is your goal
seems to work
Uh, yeah, losing fat is definitely a goal, haha
most of the time you seem to be wanting to add mass
Muscle, yes
Fat, no
which still boggles my mind why you feel you need to add muscle at this point
Enh, it's not so much that I feel I need to add muscle
right, so that's why you routinely kill yourself at the gym
I don't do it because of the physical appearance aspect, insofar as having visible muscles
1) I love minor soreness
It definitely is addictive
2) I'm also addicted to topping my previous records
it's so peculiar
/shrug
It makes sense to me, knowing my history
I suppose
I mean my motivations/reasons for continuing
Nevermind, it doesn't matter
are you trying to became a crimefighter?
no lol
I just have weird socialization
you like to fight people?
No /sigh
lol
at this point, it would almost make more sense if it were for the physical appearance
/shrug
but it sounds like you just do it to do it
I mean, the more lean muscle mass you have, the more calories you burn
So in theory it's helping me lose fat as well
I mean, there is a measured improvement, I get that
sure
except when you counteract that will protein shakes
*with
Protein shakes are like 150 calories o.o
well then that's not much protein
It's ~25g
it's nearly impossible to gain muscle mass while losing fat
I'm aware
so what's changed, or how's it changed?
Hm?
My weight?
aside from the -6 lbs
Some of it was probably water
Oh, what are you asking
lack of socializing
Yeah, not eating out/drinking
better food
and falling in love
